name: Azurewrath
flavorText: Before he fell, Izual was the bearer of the runeblade Azurewrath, an ancient sword blessed by the Song of the Arch as an instrument of the righteous.
flavorTextHtml: Before he fell, Izual was the bearer of the runeblade Azurewrath, an ancient sword blessed by the Song of the Arch as an instrument of the righteous.

primary.textHtml: Cold skills deal [15 - 20]% more damage.

secondary.textHtml: [20.0 - 25.0]% Chance to Freeze on Hit
Undead and Demon enemies within 25 yards take 565% weapon damage as Holy every second and are sometimes knocked into the air. [500 - 650]%
